description.en: VeriCoin (VRC) is a Proof of Stake-Time cryptocurrency. It was previously a Proof-of-Stake cryptocurrency with Proof of Work used to mine coins in the early stage. VeriCoin began work on PoST after the MintPal VRC hack and the subsequent roll back. More information on Proof of Stake-Time can be obtained by reading the whitepaper here. There is no Pre-mine or IPO for VeriCoin. The minimum stake time is at least 8 hours. The one highlight feature of VeriCoin is VeriFund. VeriFund is the answer to ensure stability and growth of VeriCoin. It is used to counter the inflationary effect of the proof of stake. When the supply increases, VeriFund will purchase liquid supply of VeriCoin to ensure growth and stability of the coin's value. More info about VeriFund can be found at http://vericoin.info/verifund.html Another key feature of VeriCoin is VeriSMS. VeriSMS is an SMS wallet system that gives your phone capability to access the VeriCoin network. Some of the available commands include "Balance", "setpassword", and "SEND". More information about VeriSMS can be found at http://vericoin.info/text.html

description.ko:
세계 최초로 듀얼 블록체인 프로토콜 기술을 기반으로 개발한 코인입니다. 

베리코인은 비트코인과 성격이 비슷하게 만든 블록체인기반 디지털 통화이며 코인은 세계 어디든지 빠르게 (블록처리속도 1분) 보내고 받을 수 있으며 이러한 과정은 블록체인 거래기록에 남아 안전하게 이루어집니다.

비트코인과 비교하면 비트코인보다 30배는 빠르고 보안이 개선되었으며

먼저 물량을 확보한 사람이 없고 ICO도 하지 않은 코인에다가 수수료는 매우 적게 낸다고 합니다.

베리코인의 특이한 점은 마이닝(채굴)이 필요없다는 것인데요. 베리코인은 순수한 디지털 통화의 역할을 하고 있습니다. 채굴은 베리움(VERIUM)코인을 통해 이루어 집니다. 마이너(채굴자)들은 베리움 채굴 프로그램으로 베리움을 채굴합니다.

status_updates.description: The Community Update #46-2020 is out. Find out what have been done last week and what's coming on https://vericoin.info/community-update-46-2020/
WE ARE LIVE on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-iZNDvKWAQ !! Join us !
Join us for a new Verilive this Friday, November 6th at 2 PM EST. More info on https://vericoin.info/verilive-6/
A new Community Update is out. Come check it out on https://vericoin.info/community-update-45-2020/

Verium VIP1, Infrastructure Migration, Vericoin, ...
Find out a summary of the week in our Weekly Community Update #44-2020 ! https://vericoin.info/community-update-44-2020/

The new Community Update #43-2020 is finally out :) We fixed VeriumMiner for solo mining and are still working on Vericoin & the instractucture. More on https://vericoin.info/community-update-43-2020/
Community Update #42-2020 is out! We are still working on the Vericoin wallet :) More on https://vericoin.info/community-update-42-2020/
